Entries.1050034_GuildHistory: pause 1000/speak Marlon "Follow me."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp farmer 4 5/warp Marlon 6 5/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 250/viewport 7 6 true/pause 1500/speak Marlon "Hmm... where to begin..."/pause 600/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/speak Marlon "I'll start with the history of the guild.#$b#I founded the Adventurer's Guild over 25 years ago, after being recognized by the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras.#$b#Our Order is made up of over fifty guilds and clans around the world, spanning every continent.#$b#Our mission is to protect humanity from monsters corrupted by ancient dark magic. No one knows when this corruption started, or how it began.#$b#Some ancient legends speak of a past time when monsters and humans lived in peace. If those times were ever real, they now only exist in stories.#$b#So we, the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, have sworn an oath to protect humans from those monsters. We are, in a way, monster hunters."/pause 1050/speak Marlon "This guild in particular works closely with M. Rasmodius. You may know him as the 'Wizard'.#$b#Every guild has a wizard or witch that supports them. It's paramount our weapons are imbued with magic to pierce the life force of monsters.#$b#You may wonder why we use swords instead of conventional weapons.#$b#To destroy the life force of a monster, you must pierce their life force fibers in a slashing movement.#$b#This is the only way to ensure the monster is defeated, or else it will regenerate.#$b#Projectile weapons unfortunately don't do the trick. They are able to stun monsters, but they still require a good horizontal slash to finish them off.#$b#If you ever use a projectile weapon, you may understand what I mean, unless you use explosives or iridium ammunition."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "Alesia was a gifted sniper who used magic-imbued arrows. She used to be a member of this guild before she moved to Castle Village in the desert.#$b#She used her arrows to stun monsters before finishing them with her dagger."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 800/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 1000/speak Marlon "You may have noticed you're the 23rd adventurer, but there are only a few of us here. We used to have many more members.#$b#Over time, people have left to join other guilds and... and we..."/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 19/pause 650/speak Marlon "We have lost a lot of good people over the years. What we do is dangerous, and it's a thankless job.#$b#Thanks for joining our cause. Your help in protecting the valley is greatly appreciated. I feel as if we're a fully functioning guild again."/pause 800/speak Marlon "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 marlon_event2#I'll do everything I can to protect people.#$r -1 0 marlon_event5#It's dangerous and risky. Someone needs to do it."/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 1000/showFrame Marlon 18/pause 500/speak Marlon "I'm proud to hear that from you. You have the potential to be an excellent swordsman."/pause 1250/speak Marlon "We saw each other at the mines of Corneal Mountain. You may be wondering why we don't just seal off the entrance to the mines.#$b#Unfortunately, Joja owns the rights to the mines and won't allow us to seal it.#$b#It's strange. They don't utilize the mines in any way, despite bountiful amounts of ore.#$b#Because of this, we must venture into the mines and slay monsters before they accumulate in mass."/pause 600/speak Marlon "$q -1 null##$r -1 0 marlon_event4#There must be strong monsters deep in the mines...#$r -1 0 marlon_event3#I'll make it past that floor!"/pause 1000/speak Marlon "I must disclose to you that not every monster is corrupted and hostile.#$b#There is a Shadow Person living the sewer. His name is 'Krobus'. Rasmodius and I have been harboring him.#$b#This is to remain a secret. You'll meet Krobus soon enough. I need to see you prove your worth before I introduce you to him.$2"/pause 1200/speak Marlon "I believe that's enough conversation for you today. I'll speak with you again soon on other matters.#$b#I need to check on a new stock of weapons we just received from the new blacksmith in Castle Village."/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Marlon "Remember what I said. Krobus is to remain a secret. There would be dire consequences if anyone got wind of him."
